name: AmbientVisualsSquadCar
0:
”Alexa, open Squad Car”
”Alexa, start Squad Car”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: squad car
des:
Officer, your help has been requested! We need you, 1-2-2-4!

Optimized for Echo Show and Echo Spot, this skill does not only play back siren sound and police radio messages but enriches the experience with high-quality video in a seamless loop.

Impress your guests with fascinating screensaver on Echo Show and Echo Spot.

Currently, this skill plays back audio and/or video for two hours in a “perfect loop”. You can still use your Echo device while video and audio are playing as Alexa returns to the playback after setting a timer or asking for the time. Just what you would expect from a good screensaver.

Search for “Ambient Visuals” in the skill store or check out the “Screensaver - The Collection“ skill and you’ll get even more skills of this kind.

We’re looking forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions on how to improve the experience even more.

-----------------------------------
Stock Media provided by nmid / Pond5
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
